entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Ice fog at times this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:16 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:16 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:16 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
